front.title: Requirements for multiple address of record (AOR) reachability information in the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This document states requirements for a standardized SIP registration mechanism for multiple addresses of record, the mechanism being suitable for deployment by SIP service providers on a large scale in support of small to medium sized PBXs. The requirements are for a solution that can, as a minimum, support AORs based on E.164 numbers. This work is being discussed on the martini@ietf.org mailing list.
